arguments.argument:
draw_set_halign(fa_center) draw_set_color(c_black)
if (is_string(name)) { i18n_draw_set_font(fontMsyh12) i18n_draw_text(x + width / 2, y + 48, name, true) draw_rectangle_width(x, y, x + width, y + height, 3) draw_sprite_ext(sprPlayerIdle, -1, x + width / 2 + 4, y + 32 * 4, 4, 4, 0, c_white, 1) }
